<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Run a Container"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/container-svc/container"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Runs a Docker container with the specified parameters.

Requires the `container-svc:container:run` permission.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"assets":{"description":"Assets maps environment variable names to file URLs.\nExample: {\"MODEL\": \"https://huggingface.co/TheBloke/Mistral-7B-Instruct-v0.2-GGUF/resolve/main/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.2.Q2_K.gguf\"}\nThese files are downloaded by the File Svc and mounted in the container.\nThe environment variable `MODEL` will point to the local file path in the container.","items":{"properties":{"envVarKey":{"type":"string"},"url":{"type":"string"}},"required":["envVarKey","url"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"},"capabilities":{"allOf":[{"properties":{"gpuEnabled":{"description":"GPUEnabled specifies whether GPU support is enabled for the container.","type":"boolean"}},"type":"object"}],"description":"Capabilities define additional runtime features, such as GPU support."},"envs":{"description":"Envs are environment variables set within the container.","items":{"properties":{"key":{"description":"Key is the environment variable name.","type":"string"},"value":{"description":"Value is the environment variable value.","type":"string"}},"required":["key","value"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"},"hash":{"description":"Hash is a unique identifier for the container","type":"string"},"image":{"description":"Image is the Docker image to use for the container","example":"nginx:latest","type":"string"},"keeps":{"description":"Keeps are paths that persist across container restarts.\nThey function like mounts or volumes, but their external storage location is irrelevant.","items":{"properties":{"path":{"description":"Path is the absolute path inside the container for the folder that should persist across restarts.","type":"string"},"readOnly":{"description":"ReadOnly indicates whether the keep is read-only.","type":"boolean"}},"required":["path"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"},"labels":{"description":"Labels are metadata tags assigned to the container.","items":{"properties":{"key":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"string"}},"required":["key","value"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"},"names":{"description":"Names are the human-readable aliases assigned to the container.","items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"ports":{"description":"Ports maps host ports (keys) to container ports (values).","items":{"properties":{"host":{"type":"integer"},"internal":{"type":"integer"}},"required":["host","internal"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"}},"required":["image"],"type":"object"}}},"description":"Run Container Request","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"ports":{"description":"Ports is returned here as host ports might get mapped dynamically.","items":{"properties":{"host":{"type":"integer"},"internal":{"type":"integer"}},"required":["host","internal"],"type":"object"},"type":"array"},"started":{"type":"boolean"}},"type":"object"}}}},"400":{"description":"Invalid JSON","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}}},"500":{"description":"Internal Server Error","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
